input.sentences: the family came with me to take a trip down the river to watch a performance .
there was a lot of cool sights to be seen .
amazing art work passed us by as we snapped photos .
arriving at the performance we were all really happy and excited .
output.sentences: We went on a boat ride up the river.
There were some very cool sites.
I took some pictures of statues and buildings.
I loved the architecture of some of the places.
After that, we took in a performance.
